chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
B: Type
A: Type
lt: Rel A
R: Rel B
wfgt: well_founded lt
declt: DecRel A lt
wR: WR B R

Goal:
well_founded prod_lt

Premises:
DecRel : forall A : Type, Rel A -> Type
prod_lt = fun a b : A * B => lt (fst a) (fst b) : A * B -> A * B -> Prop
well_founded : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> Prop
Rel = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Rel _%type_scope
WR : forall A : Type, Rel A -> Type
ProdRel : forall A B : Type, Rel A -> Rel B -> A * B -> A * B -> Prop
wf_inverse_image : forall (A B : Type) (R : B -> B -> Prop) (f : A -> B), well_founded R -> well_founded (fun x y : A => R (f x) (f y))
wf_inverse_rel : forall (A B : Type) (R : B -> B -> Prop) (F : A -> B -> Prop), well_founded R -> well_founded (fun x y : A => exists2 b : B, F x b & forall c : B, F y c -> R b c)
OpenInd : forall (A : Type) (lt R : Rel A), well_founded lt -> forall xs : list A, Min A lt R xs -> (forall a : A, Min A lt R (a :: xs) -> GRBar A R (a :: xs)) -> GRBar A R xs
subRelGoodR : forall (A B : Type) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> GoodR B S (map f l)
subRelGRBar : forall (A B : Type) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> (forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a}) -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l -> GRBar B S (map f l)
well_founded_ltof : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat), well_founded (ltof A f)
well_founded_gtof : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat), well_founded (gtof A f)
well_founded_inv_rel_inv_lt_rel : forall (A : Set) (F : A -> nat -> Prop), well_founded (inv_lt_rel A F)
NegRel : forall A : Type, Rel A -> A -> A -> Prop
GRBar : forall A : Type, Rel A -> list A -> Type
well_founded_inv_lt_rel_compat : forall (A : Set) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (F : A -> nat -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> inv_lt_rel A F x y) -> well_founded R
well_founded_lt_compat : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (R : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> f x < f y) -> well_founded R
nmin : forall (A : Type) (lt R : Rel A), Min A lt R nil
nilGRBar : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A), GRBar A R nil -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l
monGoodR1 : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (xs bs : list A), GoodR A R bs -> GoodR A R (xs ++ bs)
fold_left : forall A B : Type, (A -> B -> A) -> list B -> A -> A
SearchG : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), GoodR A R l -> GoodR A R (a :: l)
consGRBar : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (l : list A), GRBar A R l -> forall a : A, GRBar A R (a :: l)
fold_right : forall A B : Type, (B -> A -> A) -> A -> list B -> A
FoundG : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l -> GoodR A R (a :: l)
lt_wf = well_founded_ltof nat (fun m : nat => m) : well_founded Peano.lt
monGRBar : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (xs bs cs : list A), GRBar A R (xs ++ cs) -> GRBar A R (xs ++ bs ++ cs)
monGoodR : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (xs bs cs : list A), GoodR A R (xs ++ bs) -> GoodR A R (xs ++ cs ++ bs)
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
list_prod : forall A B : Type, list A -> list B -> list (A * B)
combine : forall A B : Type, list A -> list B -> list (A * B)
Relation_Operators.symprod_sind : forall (A B : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (leB : B -> B -> Prop) (P : A * B -> A * B -> SProp), (forall x x' : A, leA x x' -> forall y : B, P (x, y) (x', y)) -> (forall y y' : B, leB y y' -> forall x : A, P (x, y) (x, y')) -> forall p p0 : A * B, Relation_Operators.symprod A B leA leB p p0 -> P p p0
Inductive symprod (A B : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (leB : B -> B -> Prop) : A * B -> A * B -> Prop := left_sym : forall x x' : A, leA x x' -> forall y : B, Relation_Operators.symprod A B leA leB (x, y) (x', y) | right_sym : forall y y' : B, leB y y' -> forall x : A, Relation_Operators.symprod A B leA leB (x, y) (x, y') Arguments Relation_Operators.symprod (_ _)%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.left_sym (_ _)%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.right_sym (_ _)%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.gt_wf : forall z : nat, well_founded (fun n m : nat => m < n <= z)
PeanoNat.Nat.lt_wf : forall z : nat, well_founded (fun n m : nat => z <= n < m)
cmin : forall (A : Type) (lt R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), Min A lt R l -> (forall y : A, lt y a -> GRBar A R (y :: l)) -> Min A lt R (a :: l)
monGRBarAux : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (l : list A), GRBar A R l -> forall xs bs cs : list A, l = xs ++ cs -> GRBar A R (xs ++ bs ++ cs)
BinNat.N.lt_wf : forall z : BinNums.N, well_founded (fun n m : BinNums.N => BinNat.N.le z n /\ BinNat.N.lt n m)
BinInt.Z.lt_wf : forall z : BinNums.Z, well_founded (fun n m : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.le z n /\ BinInt.Z.lt n m)
BinInt.Z.gt_wf : forall z : BinNums.Z, well_founded (fun n m : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.lt m n /\ BinInt.Z.le n z)
BinNat.N.gt_wf : forall z : BinNums.N, well_founded (fun n m : BinNums.N => BinNat.N.lt m n /\ BinNat.N.le n z)
Acc_inverse_image : forall (A B : Type) (R : B -> B -> Prop) (f : A -> B) (x : A), Acc R (f x) -> Acc (fun x0 y : A => R (f x0) (f y)) x
sndL = map (fun p : A * B => snd p) : list (A * B) -> list B Arguments sndL _%list_scope
Acc_inverse_rel : forall (A B : Type) (R : B -> B -> Prop) (F : A -> B -> Prop) (b : B), Acc R b -> forall x : A, F x b -> Acc (fun x0 y : A => exists2 b0 : B, F x0 b0 & forall c : B, F y c -> R b0 c) x
